description: A Youtube Player Component for angular2
name: ng2-youtube-player

scripts.clean: rimraf src/*.js && rimraf src/*.d.ts && rimraf ./*scroll.js && rimraf ./*scroll.d.ts
scripts.dev: npm run watch & karma start karma.conf.js --bdd
scripts.pretest: npm run clean && npm run build:test
scripts.preversion: npm run clean && npm run prepublish && npm test
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run lite
